name: Space Run: Adventure Above Sky
summary:
Space Run Epic! Sling Escape will take you to an epic cosmic adventure. Fly away from the Earth and visit multiple planets in the quickest way possible. Can you bend the laws of physics and escape velocity?
Tap to blast off your space pod and leave planet Earth in this addictive casual runner game. Rockets doesn't work anymore and you are getting trained to fly a space pod to travel across the galaxy! Your adrenaline level will be on an all-time high when you dodge incoming asteroids and collect bonus points from black holes. We hope you are up for sleepless nights in this addictive action game orbiting planets and more!
